text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump It’s unfortunate that @realDonaldTrump continues to do things that prompt #investing. #TrumpPressBriefing leave Americans uneasy and confused. And worse he attacks people trying to help during the #CoronavirusPandemic. Thank you @SpeakerPelosi.
